document.full_text: m.f. hussain rose from a career as a movie billboard artist to become india's most sought-after painter before going into exile over nude images of hindu icons.
document.title: m.f. hussain, india's most prominent painter, dies at 95
lines_and_colors: m.f. hussain rose from a career as a movie billboard artist to become india's most sought-after painter before going into exile over nude images of hindu icons.
